infoModal.title: About Living Images
infoModal.p1: kulturfinder.sh lets you bring real images to life!
infoModal.p2: How does it work? It's simple: When you see a Living Image in a participating cultural institution, open the Living Image Viewer on the institution's page or scan the corresponding QR code. Now point your device at the image and let its story surprise you! Don't forget to turn on the sound.
